DOC.brief_summary: The goal study examine change bacterial ecology inflammatory marker female genital tract levonorgestrel intrauterine device placement . The specific research objective project include : 1 . Characterization vaginal , cervical uterine bacterial specie community prior LNG IUD placement use bacterial DNA microarray analysis . Samples collect 1 week 2 month IUD insertion . 2 . Characterization vaginal , cervical uterine inflammatory cytokine milieu prior LNG IUD placement use human RNA microarray analysis . Samples analyze one day three week IUD insertion . 3 . Establish tissue bank vaginal , cervical uterine specimens future research .
DOC.brief_title: Changes Vaginal , Cervical Uterine Microflora With Levonorgestrel Intrauterine Device Placement
DOC.criteria: Not currently pregnant No use hormonal birth control least three month prior enrollment Desiring levonorgestrel IUD birth control Greater 6 month postpartum Greater 6 week miscarriage No antibiotic use past 6 week Uterine Abnormalities Current use hormonal contraceptive use less 3 month ago Unexplained vaginal bleeding Irregular menses Cervical dysplasia Cervical vaginal infection last 6 week Douching within week prior sample collection Use vaginal lubricant within week prior sample collection
